Blood Imp.note: Interestingly, range is no longer on the monster stats sheets in JotL, range is only on ability cards.

special.note: If Giant Vipers are next to Zealots, they die and Blood Imps spawn next to Zealot.
Spawn Black Imps adjacent to revealed tables.
Each Zealot kills one Black Imp within range 3 and gain stun. Spawn elite Blood Imps.
